room_title: Escape room "Queen Anne's Revenge" by Time Masterz in Harlingen
room_description:
This is the Queen Anne's Revenge, rated "G" for General Audiences. The skill level ranges from easy to hard. 
You and your fellow teammates are crew members that served aboard a merchant vessel that was plundered by Blackbeard. You were all given a choice: serve as captive crew members on the Queen Anne's Revenge or die. As hostage crewmembers, you overhear rumors of a fantastic treasure hidden in a cave on one of Blackbeard's secret supply islands. As it turns out, Blackbeard is currently steering the Queen Anne's Revenge towards that very island to re-supply. Now is your chance for you and your comrades to make your move! You must escape from the ship, find the secret cave and unlock the treasure. But beware, Blackbeard left warnings for those who cross him. Dead men tell no tales!
